content: Hello friendly neighborhood FHIR-I co-chairs, hope you've all had a good weekend. Question: I have a list of Jira issues and their resolutions that I posted to the Subscriptions stream. Since the changes have all been merged in and nobody had any other feedback, I assume the next step is to mark the issues as 'applied', which I cannot do. Is there a process for requesting that, or is this message as much 'process' as exists for this? Thanks!
Let's talk about that in today's call
When you apply an approved change, you can (and should) automatically update the tracker to be 'Applied'. No further WG discussion or action is needed.
And if the change has not been formally aproved, the status can be pre-applied, correct?
That sounds good - except that I can't do it. I assume it's restricted to co-chairs?
It's restricted to co-chairs or designates. You're now officially a designate :)
Follow-up: can a designate become un-desginated? :halo: :stuck_out_tongue_wink:
Yup. And a co-chair can be come un-co-chaired...
